content:
Do I understand correctly that:
1) ELs need to be updated with the head of the chain or block very close to it during initial sync, if it is a block that is too far away from the head the state won't be available and the sync won't progress
2) If initial sync was completed in the past, it is fine to point to a block that is quite far away from the head because in this case ELs never use state sync and rather pull off blocks and execute them to catch up with the chain

author: potuz
content: yes so this is what I want to do with pessimistic sync
